column1: Art Institute of Chicago////It is large and confusing with lots of stairs
column3: and rooms. That is part of the fun. Get lost in here enjoying the art and finding that special piece that calls out to you. I have been here many times and still enjoy every visit. There are also extensive programs and events with docent tours and everything else
column4: including a cafe and gift shop. Take advantage of the coat and bag check to avoid carrying your wet or bulky stuff around.
